summary: This mod is a RETEXTURE mod I made by my self, this is also my first mod so go easy on me.  This mod is using the DAEDRIC Armour set so it looks like scales on it.
descriptionHtml:
This is my  first mod ever created it is a retexture mod of the daedric armor I call it DaedricScale 

I have delted the files and made  2 MASTER files which I will explain

On is the- DaedricScale Armor and Weapon PACK- this includes the Armor for the orignal file and weapons but now there high quality download this one if your computer dosnt lag right now cause its a bigger file

The next on is- Low quality weapon and armor pack- This pack was released for people with slow laggy computers.

I hope you enjoy this mod I put alot of effort into it.  

Special Thanks goees  to- Xescreamer - He\'s the one who made the armor and weapons High quality he send them to me and I put together he\'s was a big help and expect more mods from me with the help of him. GIVE HIM KUDOS!! :P

Programs used- Photoshop CS5 to make the retexture 
WinRAR- To compress and make the files a .RAR to upload

Other Mods:
Holy Glass armor- it is basicaly glass armor but super bright and shiney in the sun, Im expecting Xescreamer to naybe Make it High quality and mess around with it.

Thank-you for downloading this mod and if your truley love it leave me and Xescreamer a kudos!! :D
author: jadetowers1
